_meanings:
{@--2@} To drive away,
disperse, dispel, remove, take away;
{#amI janasTAnamapoQaviGnaM matvA#} <ls>R. 13. 22</ls>
freed from obstacles;  
{#aTAnapoQArgalamapyagAraM#} ({#pravizwAM#}) <ls n="R.">16. 6</ls> the bolts
of which were not removed or 
unchained; {#taducCizwamapohya#} <ls>Dk. 133.</ls>
